Install Charmy
==============

.. caution::

   Python version should >= 3.11 !

It`s easy to install ``Charmy GUI``. You can install it using ``pip``:

.. code-block:: shell

   pip install charmy

or git clone the repository:

.. code-block:: shell

   git clone https://github.com/yourusername/charmy.git
   cd charmy
   pip install -e .


Dependency library matching
---------------------------
Charmy is supported on Windows, macOS, and Linux. Support multiple backend libraries.

You can choose different backend libraries to get different features.

.. admonition:: 1. ``skia-python`` + ``pyopengl`` + ``glfw`` (Basic)
   :class: important

   .. code-block:: shell

      pip install skia-python pyopengl glfw
